title: The View from Iran
content:
News Dissector Danny Schechter will report on his recent visit to Iran on News Dissector Radio on the Progressive Radio... <!--more--> Network on Friday February 10th 1-2 PM.
He will be joined live from Iran by University Professor Foad Izadi of the University of Tehran and Nader Talebzadeh, an Iranian TV talk show host and prominent filmmaker.
Finanacial Journalist Aaron Kowne of ML-Implode.
com who has been on the program many times will make his first in-studio appearance.
Catherine Watters will be in studio.
